verses.t: My son{H1121}, forget{H7911} not my law{H8451}; but let thine heart{H3820} keep{H5341} my commandments{H4687}:
For length{H753} of days{H3117}, and long{H8141} life{H2416}, and peace{H7965}, shall they add{H3254} to thee.long…: Heb. years of life
Let not mercy{H2617} and truth{H571} forsake{H5800} thee: bind{H7194} them about thy neck{H1621}; write{H3789} them upon the table{H3871} of thine heart{H3820}:
So shalt thou find{H4672} favour{H2580} and good{H2896} understanding{H7922} in the sight{H5869} of God{H430} and man{H120}.good…: or, good success
Trust{H982} Lordin the {H3068} with all thine heart{H3820}; and lean{H8172} not unto thine own understanding{H998}.
In all thy ways{H1870} acknowledge{H3045} him, and he shall direct{H3474} thy paths{H734}.
Be not wise{H2450} in thine own eyes{H5869}: fear{H3372} Lordthe {H3068}, and depart{H5493} from evil{H7451}.
It shall be health{H7500} to thy navel{H8270}, and marrow{H8250} to thy bones{H6106}.health: Heb. medicinemarrow: Heb. watering, or, moistening
Honour{H3513} Lordthe {H3068} with thy substance{H1952}, and with the firstfruits{H7225} of all thine increase{H8393}:
So shall thy barns{H618} be filled{H4390} with plenty{H7647}, and thy presses{H3342} shall burst out{H6555} with new wine{H8492}.
My son{H1121}, despise{H3988} not the chastening{H4148} Lordof the {H3068}; neither be weary{H6973} of his correction{H8433}:
LordFor whom the {H3068} loveth{H157} he correcteth{H3198}; even as a father{H1} the son{H1121} in whom he delighteth{H7521}.
Happy{H835} is the man{H120} that findeth{H4672} wisdom{H2451}, and the man{H120} that getteth{H6329} understanding{H8394}.that getteth…: Heb. that draweth out understanding
For the merchandise{H5504} of it is better{H2896} than the merchandise{H5505} of silver{H3701}, and the gain{H8393} thereof than fine gold{H2742}.
She is more precious{H3368} than rubies{H6443}: and all the things thou canst desire{H2656} are not to be compared{H7737} unto her.
Length{H753} of days{H3117} is in her right hand{H3225}; and in her left hand{H8040} riches{H6239} and honour{H3519}.
Her ways{H1870} are ways{H1870} of pleasantness{H5278}, and all her paths{H5410} are peace{H7965}.
She is a tree{H6086} of life{H2416} to them that lay hold{H2388} upon her: and happy{H833} is every one that retaineth{H8551} her.
LordThe {H3068} by wisdom{H2451} hath founded{H3245} the earth{H776}; by understanding{H8394} hath he established{H3559} the heavens{H8064}.established: or, prepared
By his knowledge{H1847} the depths{H8415} are broken up{H1234}, and the clouds{H7834} drop down{H7491} the dew{H2919}.
My son{H1121}, let not them depart{H3868} from thine eyes{H5869}: keep{H5341} sound wisdom{H8454} and discretion{H4209}:
So shall they be life{H2416} unto thy soul{H5315}, and grace{H2580} to thy neck{H1621}.
Then shalt thou walk{H3212} in thy way{H1870} safely{H983}, and thy foot{H7272}shall not stumble{H5062}.
When thou liest down{H7901}, thou shalt not be afraid{H6342}: yea, thou shalt lie down{H7901}, and thy sleep{H8142} shall be sweet{H6149}.
Be not afraid{H3372} of sudden{H6597} fear{H6343}, neither of the desolation{H7722} of the wicked{H7563}, when it cometh{H935}.
LordFor the {H3068} shall be thy confidence{H3689}, and shall keep{H8104} thy foot{H7272} from being taken{H3921}.
Withhold{H4513} not good{H2896} from them to whom it is due{H1167}, when it is in the power{H410} of thine hand{H3027} to do{H6213} it.them…: Heb. the owners thereof
Say{H559} not unto thy neighbour{H7453}, Go{H3212}, and come again{H7725}, and to morrow{H4279} I will give{H5414}; when thou hast{H3426} it by thee.
Devise{H2790} not evil{H7451} against thy neighbour{H7453}, seeing he dwelleth{H3427} securely{H983} by thee.Devise…: or, Practise no evil
Strive{H7378} not with a man{H120} without cause{H2600}, if he have done{H1580} thee no harm{H7451}.
Envy{H7065} thou not the oppressor{H2555}, and choose{H977} none of his ways{H1870}.the oppressor: Heb. a man of violence
For the froward{H3868} is abomination{H8441} Lordto the {H3068}: but his secret{H5475} is with the righteous{H3477}.
The curse{H3994} Lordof the {H3068} is in the house{H1004} of the wicked{H7563}: but he blesseth{H1288} the habitation{H5116} of the just{H6662}.
Surely he scorneth{H3887} the scorners{H3887}: but he giveth{H5414} grace{H2580} unto the lowly{H6041}.
The wise{H2450} shall inherit{H5157} glory{H3519}: but shame{H7036} shall be the promotion{H7311} of fools{H3684}.shall be…: Heb. exalteth the fools
